short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extract the employee profiles with email of a company on LinkedIn into CSV file.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
How to automatically export LinkedIn company Employees?
1. Enter the company's URL Link
2. Click the "Export Employees" button to export

v2.0.0 Update
- Add enrich email with Email finder API, please contact us to add more providers.
- Most email finders need company name, please choose the extract user's company info option.

Note: LinkedIn only displays 1000 profiles per company, so from a single company, you won't be able to access more than this.

EXPORT COLUMNS
#Profile Link, #First Name, #Last Name, #Full Name, #Subtitle, #Location, #Picture URL, #Degree, #Is Permium, #Company Name, #Company Title, #School Name, #Degree Name, #Field Of Study, #Industry Name, #Summary, #Location Name, #Country Name, #Address, #Prefer Country Code, #Prefer Language Code, #Birth Date, #Is Student
